sentences: Pühapäeval on linnas alati palju inimesi.
context: The word 'pühapäeval' is the elative case of 'pühapäev', which means 'Sunday'. In Estonian, the elative case (-l ending) indicates movement away from something or location in/on something. Here it functions as an adverbial expression meaning 'on Sunday' or 'at Sunday', indicating when something happens.
